english.segment1: You said your days were over. That the sun would never shine again. From glory days, to wicked ways. You've lost your forgiveness of sin. You walk through your desert. Wondering why and what you've become. You said you've slipped through the fingers. Of the hands of God
english.segment2: [Chorus]. You've fallen out of His hands. Or atleast that's what you said. The truth is not that the truth is this. The only way to esacape. The Lord is if you crawl. Through the holes in His hands.
english.segment3: I ran away I did not lead you say in the darkness you stand. But you are not forgotten, you're in His mighty hands. Now turn aside and see this sight, a flame that does not consume. To show you that He's called your name. You're one of His chosen few
english.segment5: Come closer, come closer now to Him. Come closer, come closer. His name is I am that I am. You said your days were over. That the Son would never use you again. But by one man's disobedience. Came One who's conquered your sin
